document.full_text: since 2007, a transitional administrator has run the cook county juvenile temporary detention center, taking on a culture of mismanagement. now, a court ruling could threaten the very existence of his job.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: uncertainty at juvenile jail in wake of latest lawsuit
lines_and_colors: since 2007, a transitional administrator has run the cook county juvenile temporary detention center, taking on a culture of mismanagement. now, a court ruling could threaten the very existence of his job.
